body:
I also don't understand how @0intro keeps reporting so much better performance than me when he runs it.

Does plan9 have problems with the `os/exec` package or child processes in general? Because the `buildlet` is running `all.rc` under `os/exec` (not via rio or drawterm or whatever; I don't know Plan 9), and it's slow. And those tests in `test/*.go` above taking 3-6 seconds each are also run via `os/exec`. Related?

/cc @ality too
